                    const redirectURL = '';

                    // If the document has had it's visibility changed
                    // most likely that means the app opened or we
                    // were redirected to the app store so we can close
                    // the tab. However, android doesn't redirect back properly
                    // so we can't close it.
                    const isAndroid = /Android/i.test(navigator.userAgent);
                    if (!isAndroid) {
                        document.addEventListener('visibilitychange', () => {
                            if (document.hidden ) {
                                window.close();
                            }
                        });
                    }

                    // Close the tab if we don't get a redirect URL passed
                    // as we would then be coming from the callback from
                    // square.
                    if (!redirectURL) {
                        window.close();
                    } else {
                        // Try to open the app if that doesn't work show the download button
                        // after the fact.
                        if (isAndroid) {
                            window.open(redirectURL);
                        } else {
                            window.location.href = redirectURL;
                        }
                        setTimeout(() => {
                            document.getElementById('checking').classList.add('d-none');
                            document.getElementById('download-button').classList.remove('d-none');
                        }, 2000);
                    }
